response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand its worth stands at $15,000. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at an exclusive price of $12,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with exceptional value while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
